channel.title: [PI] Adding pest control monsters
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
Does anyone have the code for a working pest control game for PI? I have the monsters ID, but they have to attack the void knight, heal portals etc.. I can't code that myself.
Thanks in advance.
Radar

item.title: [PI] Adding pest control monsters
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

autospawn.cdf

get npc id’s and add cords

Adding auto-attack shouldn’t be too hard.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding pest control monsters
item.dc:creator: @Radars Radars
item.description:
@Radars wrote:

I thought I remembered a tutorial on it, but I can’t find it anywhere. I will just spawn some monsters and let them attack the players for now. I do have the interface tho, so it’s a fun minigame nevertheless.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding pest control monsters
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Oh my gosh… Way too much coding… lol…
First off Im a Delta Coder and I’ve made NPCS spawn and Attack players on my source To attack the Void Knight is Quite difficult coding and reading it alone from a guide feels kinda intense and like your holding the holy grail at the same time
Secondly Healing isnt so bad just modify the Healing Jad Command
that npcs have… If you dont have one sorry still a Delta Coder i dont know a whole lot of PI.

Read full topic
